rooms.description: A spacious entry hall with an open reception area and a foyer leading to the living spaces, incorporating natural stone elements.

An expansive open-plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on the south and east facing walls to maximize natural light, reflecting a Bohemian aesthetic with vibrant textiles and reclaimed wood accents.
A dining space adjacent to the kitchen with large windows offering views of the surrounding landscape, designed for both everyday use and hosting.
A modern yet rustic kitchen with an island counter, floor-to-ceiling windows for ventilation and natural light, integrating local materials.
A dedicated home office space with floor-to-ceiling windows to ensure a bright environment, optimized for productivity and natural ventilation.
A spacious master bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the garden, incorporating traditional elements and natural light.
A guest bedroom designed with a Bohemian flair, featuring open shelving and floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light.
A multifunctional space that can serve as an additional bedroom or guest lounge, blending traditional motifs with modern decor.
An intimate space designed for relaxation, decorated with vibrant Bohemian elements and ensuring ample natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows.

openings.description: A wide, inviting front door featuring traditional design elements and integrated security features.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the living room, designed to let in ample natural light and enhance ventilation.
Large windows in the dining room to offer views of the surrounding nature, ensuring a bright dining space.
Floor-to-ceiling kitchen window, allowing for natural light and ventilation during food preparation.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the home office to provide a well-lit work environment.
An opening leading from the living area to the swimming pool, ensuring easy access.

rooms.description: A spacious fifth bedroom with a view of the landscape, designed for privacy and relaxation.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows in the upper floor bedroom to ensure natural light and ventilation.
A wide, elegant staircase connecting the upper floor to the ground floor, designed with safety and aesthetics in mind.
